column5: justherb asked me to post this for him.  OFC - I can't get on to the site. When I try to log in it tells me I'm not a member and when I try to register or re-register it tells me there is already a justherb. I haven't signed on for a couple of months. Can someone tell me what I'm doing wrong?  Thanks Herb please respond to his email address    [email protected]
did he reply to the email that was sent to him to complete the register process often in ends up in their spam/junk mail folder and they miss it
You got spam/junl mail .HEHEHEHEHE I know,it,s still early.LOL
Have justherb try the "Help if forgotten my password!!!" link it will email him his password to the valid email address he provided... hopefully it'll help   Gerritt.

He may in fact have originally registered on my computer, neither of us can remember for sure (we're both getting old LOL).  I was busy all day yesterday and will be in and out quite a bit today, so if someone can sort this out for him please send the replies to his email address. [email protected]  Thanks  Big Cliff

Thanks for the suggestionson how to get on the site. I ran into the same problems as before when I tried them. Either got a "no member by that name" or "already a member with that name". So I tried to log on as usual and I am here. As Big Cliff said I'm getting old and forgetful but not as much as him. LOL  I have no idea as to what I was doing but should be OK now.  Thanks again Herb
Hey Herb:  Good to see you are back with us...won't be too long and we will be fishing for ??? (whatever) off of Cliff's dock...
Glad to see you back Herb  Beans, those things are called 'FISH'.
Good to see you back on line buddy!
Not just fish to be caught on Cliff's dock Roy. A couple of times I could have easily hooked myself a critter named Andy...a fish wanabee.
It's not Cliff's dock, it's Andy's dock  He just lets me and my buddies fish there if we are nice to him LOL.
ANDY...checking out my catch off his dock...
